title: FRD 2016 Campinas
description: O Food Revolution Day tem como objetivo aumentar a conscientização sobre a importância da boa alimentação e melhorar a educação alimentar de todos, concentrando-se em três ações simples - COZINHAR, COMPARTILHAR e VIVENCIAR.
address: Cis Guanabara - Rua Mário Siqueira, 829 - Botafogo - Campinas - SP.

title: Jamie Oliver FRD 2016 #NoSugarChallenge Garden Party
description: Ne pregatim de FOOD REVOLUTION DAY 2016, vineri 20 mai in scoli si sambata 21 mai la gradina Café Verona, eveniment dupa un program de educatie alimentara initiat la nivel global de Jamie Oliver cu ateliere de gatit si nutritie GRATUITE.
address: 13-15 Pictor Arthur Verona St. @ Carturesti, 010312 Bucharest, Romania

title: FRD Central Coast NSW
description: Food Rev Ambassadors are committed to sharing knowledge with our programs cooking, and living toward a healthier Australia, sharing Jamie Olivers' vision

title: Forbes Food Revolution Day
description: A free demonstration day with farmers' market stalls, children's activities, health service providers, multicultural groups, community groups and local businesses all involved in teaching people about healthy food options, cooking techniques and growing your own fruit and veg at home.

title: FoodRev ISH
description: 200 students, teachers and parents will be involved in the talk, events (5 food stations with fun activities and games revolving around food) at international school Hamburg

title: Planting Project for Refugees
description: Planting project for the refugees involves starting a veggie garden and greenhouse for them so that they can grow and look after their own food. Planters built from recycled wood and I have got everything needed for this project donated.

title: FRD Košice 2016
description: Food revolution day je hlavnou aktivitou roka svetoznámeho šéfkuchára Jamie Olivera a jeho nadácie. Okrem neho sa do tejto celosvetovej oslavy jedla zapájajú Ambasádori Food Foundation vo všetkých krajinách sveta.

title: Food Revolution Day Barrie
description: For the 5th year in a row, Barrie Food Revolution is bringing together the community, businesses and residents to CELEBRATE, EDUCATE & GROW TOGETHER. Join us May 18th, 2016 Southshore Centre, Barrie, Ontario Canada from 10 am to 4 pm.
address: SOUTHSHORE CENTRE 205 LAKESHORE DR, BARRIE ONTARIO

title: Food Revolution Day, Bend, OR
description: Grow your food to know your food
address: Savory Spice Shop, Old Mill District, 375 SW Powerhouse Dr, Set A110 Bend, OR 97702

title: Food Revolution Venezuela
description: Realizaremos varios eventos en Venezuela. Tres encuentros importantes: Dos en Caracas y uno en Mérida. Asimismo, actividades con niños de la Fundación Don Bosco, Jardín de la Esperanza y Los Romeritos.
address: Caracas. Sede del Grupo Social CESAP y CC Galerías Los Naranjos. Mérida: Sede de la Fundación Don Bosco.

title: Food Revolution Day St Paul's Walden
description: A week of cooking at the school, culminating in a day of celebrations on Friday 20th, including celebrating the opening of our Kitchen Garden
address: St Paul's Walden School, Bendish Lane, Whitwell, SG4 8HX

title: Food Revolution Day
description: Schools, Nursaries, Offices and Individuals to cook from scratch of 20th on May 2026

title: Food Revolution Day Poland 2016
description: Lekturę about overdosing sugar and about food wasting. Conference with people who has achieved a success in culinary world. Wege cooking classes with MasterChef Poland winner.

title: Food Revolution Day Madrid
description: We are doing a cooking workshop with 50 children.

title: Food Revolution Day Curacao
description: A free 45 minute cooking workshop for kids at the local zoo, we have 8 cooking stations which can seat 8 kids each. Event takes place on Sat 21st May from 9 - 13:00. Schol have been invites as well as the local autism association.

title: Kids in the Kitchen
description: A Parent-Child Cooking Class for Food Revolution Day
address: St Lawrence Market, 93 Front St East, Toronto
